A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's entertaining\, but the movie has a weak story spine\, and lacks focus. Has too much going to the point where there isn't enough time for believable character development and motives for anyone. Should have made Rey's story arc the central driving force of the film\, because it was the strongest and would have given the film direction. It felt like a TV series load of characters crammed into a feature film. Over all disappointing.
